name: mcp-servers-workspace
description: MCP Servers for Confluence, Jira, and Slack integration

scripts.build: npm run build:confluence && npm run build:jira && npm run build:slack
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:all
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:confluence" "npm run start:jira" "npm run start:slack"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:confluence" "npm run dev:jira" "npm run dev:slack"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:confluence && npm run install:jira && npm run install:slack
scripts.clean:win: rmdir /s /q node_modules & for /d %i in (mcp-servers\*) do rmdir /s /q "%i\node_modules" "%i\dist"
